title: 5 minute microwave Nutella® cake
ingredients: ['30g self-raising flour', '50g caster sugar', '1 egg', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '3 tablespoons milk', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder, or more to taste', '2 tablespoons chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella®), or more to taste', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract']
